|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "8WUSAC01.0A1G" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device uses two [[Skyworks]] SKY85803 Front-End Modules.
*{{WiFiCert|WFA16610|11/19/2012}} {{See also|Alpha Networks}}
